title: Looking for support main Silver +
body:
Looking for a support main that could play hard initiation champs
such as {{champion:37}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:201}}

replies.body: Hey i am a bruam main from last season and Leo from the season before, i ve been playing Morgana hard this season currently ranked silver 3 90LP

IGN: TTMY add me
G1 Atm
